summary: This is an internal email from July 2, 2020, congratulating a team on the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell earlier that day. The email highlights the significant effort required to build the case against her and mentions an upcoming press conference.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email, arrested on the morning of July 2, 2020, and described as a woman 'very worthy of criminal prosecution'.

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested in the morning. The email congratulates the team responsible for building the case leading to her arrest.

events.title: Press Conference on Maxwell Case
events.description: A press conference was scheduled for 12:00 on the day of the arrest to discuss the case.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on the morning of July 2, 2020.
The email emphasizes that the charges were not inevitable but resulted from 'extraordinary amount of work and perseverance and creativity' by a team.
The case was built on conduct described as older than the team's paralegals, indicating historical allegations.
A press conference regarding the arrest was scheduled for 12:00 on July 2, 2020.
